Write HYDRUS1D.dat

Source: R/read_write_hydrus1d_dat.R
write_hydrus1d.Rd

Write HYDRUS1D.dat

Usage

write_hydrus1d(
  hydrus1d_list,
  path = system.file("extdata/model/test/HYDRUS1D.dat", package = "kwb.hydrus1d")
)

Arguments

hydrus1d_list

as retrieved by read_hydrus1d

path

path to HYDRUS1D.dat for export (default: system.file("extdata/model/test/HYDRUS1D.dat", package = "kwb.hydrus1d")

Value

write HYDRUS1D.dat
